title: Annoying thing (UPDATED)
review: I really love the concept of this game, it‚Äôs very cool! But one thing that bugs me is that; After a round an ad plays, right? Sometimes I get an 30 second long unskippable ad. And the game goes on without me and the server gets full. Then it kicks me out and says ‚ÄúThis server is full‚Äù I know you probably cannot stop this from happening. But I have no one else to talk to so I only have you guys.Update: Oh! And I forgot, sometimes people make servers and people join, only to get kicked or blocked by the host. I don‚Äôt understand why people do this. What do they get out of it you ask? Nothing. Can you please make a limit of how many people you can kick? Or perhaps rules I am sincerely sorry if this problem has been fixed. But I haven‚Äôt seen it with my own eyes happen to ME, but I‚Äôve seen it happen to others.Update: I‚Äôve now discovered that the ‚ÄúAutomatic role‚Äù system is very bad for me. I‚Äôve gotten Crewmate almost all of the time. Now it‚Äôs rare if I even get imposter ONCE. I try every single day. But now it‚Äôs a very boring app for me since all I get is Crewmate and always get killed first, then have to deal with dumb people who see the body but just stand by it without reporting, then another person comes in and thinks it that person since they‚Äôre standing near the body.
sentence: And I forgot, sometimes people make servers and people join, only to get kicked or blocked by the host.

title: Unfair Game Play (how is no one talking about this)
review: Design is great. I like the colors and the modern feel of moving environments makes extended play time feel flowy and not stagnant. The peices  are fine I just used to enjoy the Car actually driving and the Ship actually sailing so it‚Äôs like game is modernized in all the wrong places. Above all else the game play is so very unfair. It rolls you exactly what you don‚Äôt need EVERY TIME. I have still never won a game, it lands me on spaces that I can‚Äôt quite afford just to show me its updated mortgaging and trading system,  you can successfully predict what every player will land on by determining what would be worse for you. I know it‚Äôs supposed to make for a ‚Äúchallenging‚Äù atmosphere but it‚Äôs so heavy handed and obvious. The only fun I have with this game is literally TRYING to lose and watching how ridiculously things play out. If you have big money and storage to but. it‚Äôs worth a chuckle but if you‚Äôre looking for a fun GAME (as opposed to an hour long march of death) then pass this over.
sentence: Design is great.

title: Flawed but fun
review: The single player game is fun for awhile, and certainly worth the initial investment, but the key to the longevity of the game is the multiplayer mode. This is fun, too, but you have to be prepared for some disappointment. Currently, there are bugs that prevent games from being finished, and these bugs can happen after you‚Äôve played for 30 minutes or more. For example, if somebody owes money, and they try to make another deal to raise more money, this seems to stop the game. It seems to lose track of whose turn it is (and who is still owed money). Sometimes, if someone refuses all your deals for that turn, it ends your turn for some reason, but the End Turn button is still shown. Pressing End Turn at this point stops the game. If you are low on battery life and get a battery warning, it can disconnect you from the game. Also, players sometimes stop playing, and there‚Äôs no warning or way to resign without stopping the game for everyone. In spite of these flaws, it‚Äôs a fun game, but there‚Äôs room for improvement. Personally, I‚Äôm waiting for these issues to get addressed before investing more money in a Season Pass.
sentence: Sometimes, if someone refuses all your deals for that turn, it ends your turn for some reason, but the End Turn button is still shown.

title: High potential, missed mark
review: At the onset I absolutely loved this game. After playing almost 20 single player matches I found some major flaws. The most annoying being the roll of the dice is not random. I understand that anything can happen in a dice roll but it seems the dice rolls are scripted. To prove this I played a single player match against one ai player on easy. I controlled all property and railroads from the go square to free parking, yes that includes the orange properties!  The opposing side only had boardwalk and park place. We both had hotels on all monopolies owned. For a numbered point of reference that‚Äôs 13 out of 20 to one side while the ai had 2 out of 20 on the opposing side. I recorded 12 cycles and I landed 8 out of 12 cycles on either one of his two squares while the ai landed only 9 times on my 13 squares out of the 12 cycles. Almost every cycle I landed on his two properties and yet many times the ai only landed on a chance, just visiting, income tax, or community passing through unscathed on my side of the board. When the ai did land it was a surprise. I‚Äôve played enough games to realize there is some scripting going on. Very disappointed!
sentence: I controlled all property and railroads from the go square to free parking, yes that includes the orange properties!

title: Awesome game, a few suggestions
review: Words can‚Äôt describe how much I love this game!! It‚Äôs just so fun and addicting. I just got it about three weeks ago and I haven‚Äôt stopped playing since. Although it‚Äôs a very well made very fun to play game, there‚Äôs some things that I think would be cool to add either to among us or among us 2. 1. There should be a way to kick people faster if you‚Äôre the host during a game. Some people like to call emergency meetings and waste time, so being able to kick them out would make it go by way faster. 2. I think it would be awesome to add a send a friend request button. Some people have really good friendships on here and a lot of the time one of them might disconnect or have to go and never see each other again! ;( If we had a add friend button, we could always play with them. Plus, when you try to give your personal number or social media‚Äôs out to someone, the whole server can see it unless you ban them all. 3. I think I saw this on another review, but maybe add a limit to camera time? It‚Äôs kinda hard to kill when people are guarding the cameras. 4. Hackers and exploiters should be automatically banned from playing. Maybe you could install a thing that detects their programming and stuff? They ruin the game a lot. Other than that, this game is amazing! Definitely game of the year. It‚Äôs made 2020 so much better. 5 stars for sure
sentence: It‚Äôs just so fun and addicting.

title: It‚Äôs fun! ü§©

But that‚Äôs the problem, you have to buy more things if you do want to have more options! But, like I said earlier, you don‚Äôt need to because they‚Äôre already so many stuff to do!

title: Fun for everyone
review: Seriously this game is the best. You can play with kids or have drunk fun with adults. There‚Äôs a category for everyone and the ones you have to pay for are totally worth it! Not to mention the funny videos that come from it! 10 out of 10 would recommend!
sentence: You can play with kids or have drunk fun with adults.

title: Great, but could use some bug squashing
review: It‚Äôs monopoly, just like you remembered in the classic board game, which is what I‚Äôve wanted on iOS for a long time. After playing very frequently, I‚Äôve been noticing some issues. 1. Dice rolls do not seem random. Quite frequently the computer rolls the perfect number to squeak by your hotels. It happens way too often. 2 when playing multiple computer opponents, if the first computer player on the list of players on the right side of the screen goes bankrupt, you can no longer purpose a deal with the other remaining opponent. It defaults to try to make a trade with the bankrupted player with no option to change it to the other player, so the only way to trade is to wait for the computer to strike a trade with you and then counter the trade. 3 when you get a card that says each player pays $10 for a birthday or whatever, the money never comes out of the players account. Maybe that‚Äôs because of the free parking rule. Not sure. 4 if you use up all of the houses so that there aren‚Äôt any more in reserve, and then sell a hotel, more houses Automatically appear. Seems odd. Being able to speed up the game instead of watching each and every animation would be appreciated.
sentence: Dice rolls do not seem random.

title: Is anyone there?
review: This will be the third review I have wrote and still nothing posted or any response given. Why offer someone to write about your game if you have no   intention to post it? I‚Äôm sure this one will end up is the same spot as the others, the deleted/don‚Äôt care what you have to say trash. The point of every game is to be challenging, what‚Äôs the fun if it isn‚Äôt. This game however takes challenging to a whole other level! As I‚Äôve said it other post, this is not a game of skill. It‚Äôs all based if the game allows the pieces to fall, the boosters to point in the direction needed to win. A blind monkey can play this game because it‚Äôs all luck, like a slot machine. Most levels, no matter if they are regular, hard, or super hard take 2-3 lives to beat. I will say, I have on very rare occasion beat a level on the first attempt. Currently I am on level 214 ‚Äúsuper hard‚Äù I have attempted to beat this level no less than 25 times, maybe more! Challenging üôÑ?  Let‚Äôs change the game to mission impossible ü§£üò≠! I have spent real money on a package to help. It‚Äôs was useless and I went through it in a couple levels. Developers, can you tone it down a bit and let people actually get through the game like games are intended? I know that seems like a lot to ask, but at least consider it before you just delete my message. Thank you for your time and mine I wasted writing this üòÇü§£!
sentence: The point of every game is to be challenging, what‚Äôs the fun if it isn‚Äôt.

title: Just One Itsy Bitsy Problem
review: This game is the best overall. Since so many new updates Dame about bug fixes, oh yeah. Now I'm starting to play Minecraft more. But... There is just one problem. I don't know how to activate my behavior packs. When I got on Addons for Minecraft PE, I saw this cool behavior pack called Better Drops. I installed it. But it was a behavior pack. When I got back on Minecraft, I got to my settings, but the add-on wasn't in the Resource Packs setting thingymajober. I got confused. I went to Storage, and I saw the Better Drops add-on. Except that it won't let me activate it. That's weird. Please tell me how to activate behavior packs. Also, I have a suggestion. Minecraft just got boring because there were no other items that are really decorative, like when you want to build a house, you needed a toilet. But there is no toilet in Minecraft. Mods like Decocraft mod and Bibliocraft mod have many other items that are decorative for a house, but sadly there are no mods for Minecraft PE. What I mean by this is that mods don't work on Minecraft PE. There are only Addons, but really Addons just REPLACE other items. Please add more items like toilets or TVs and more in Minecraft! Thanks                                    TigerWolfyy
sentence: There are only Addons, but really Addons just REPLACE other items.

title: Love the game, but hardly works
review: I absolutely love the gameplay and concept of this game. As far as games go this is the most addicting mobile game I‚Äôve personally played. I‚Äôve enjoyed it  since this game came to iOS and have even purchased some in-game cosmetic gear. I just wanna say I appreciate the devs don‚Äôt give any pay to win options in the game. Some of the tasks are annoying and the maps need balancing I think. Other than that I think the gameplay is the strongest aspect of this game as it preys on our natural suspicions of others and that‚Äôs an amazing concept for strangers and friends to play. The biggest problem I‚Äôve had though, and the reason for the 3 star rating is due to the fact that I can hardly even get matches when I want to. I get error messages often saying I was dropped from the server or that the matchmaker is full. As someone who has put money into this game I find this unacceptable. I understand the rare server issue here and there but when it takes over 20 minutes to search for game I feel like I‚Äôm literally wasting time. This game was the number one ranked action game at one point and there are ads at the end of every match. Surely the devs need to work out a better deal with their current sponsors. I really hope they don‚Äôt just divert all their assets into the planned sequel because I don‚Äôt believe the sequel will be as much of a success as it could be if any players are left disappointed in this game.
sentence: As far as games go this is the most addicting mobile game I‚Äôve personally played.

title: this HAS to be a joke.
review: i truly regret not reading the previous reviews before updating the app. this update was probably the worst downgrade ever. the graphics and the design look like a 7 year old dictated it. the only people that could seriously enjoy this game now are most likely under the age of 10 (not even that.) i seriously hope y‚Äôall decide to change it back to the original design after this month because this update was not it. literally everyone wants the classic version back. please read the reviews and learn from your mistakes because this update was a huge one. i get that you guys probably wanted something different considering that the app is 8 years old now, but changing the entire layout of the app wasn‚Äôt a good idea. it turned a wonderful game into a confusing mess. not only that, the game is 2x more laggy, the characters glitch while running, and the facebook friends aren‚Äôt showing up. this update is a train wreck. it just appears that this was clearly rushed and with that a whole bunch of errors along with it. to all the people reading this, if you haven‚Äôt updated it, DON‚ÄôT. you will genuinely regret it. i‚Äôm only rating it 3 stars because i‚Äôve played this game since 2014 and it obviously deserves the credit, but if i hadn‚Äôt then this app would be a guaranteed 1 star since the update. (if that wouldn‚Äôt have happened then it would be 5. i strongly recommend that you revert the game to its traditional setup and layout. thanks)
sentence: this update is a train wreck.

title: I love this game but....
review: Fix your glitches! I get stuck on certain screens and get kicked off. It‚Äôs not my connection nor my internet because I‚Äôve played live games like this a lot and have no issues. But I hate it when I‚Äôm winning and all of a sudden I get stuck on a screen and can‚Äôt do anything. At the very least allow us to leave a refresh or come right back or something to fix this issue. I always have no choice but to quit to menu! It‚Äôs very frustrating! You could allow like a 30 second window if a player doesn‚Äôt return and play. Also you should add a chat feature even if it‚Äôs preprogrammed with emojis or phrases or something it would be more fun if we could communicate. Time limit or limit the amount of offers/trades in one turn each person could get a maximum of 3 in each turn. This goes for the counter offers also if green tries to trade pink; pink can counter offer that counts as one offer each. They can counter back twice more each and then they either reject or take the trade, and their turn is over.

title: Sad, lonely , money taker
review: This game is good.... ONLY IF U HAVE AN ACCOUNT!!!!!!! I am so lonely! It's kind of boring... I remember the days when it was new and it was easy to play with your friends! For example! WHAT HAPPENED TO MINE CRAFT ?!!?!?!?!?!?!?!?! What happened to being creative? All the things u have added lately have been horrible!!! I still want to play it! I still want to create and have "fun"! I still have hope that some day... minecraft will come back to normality....sooo pls........ bring creativity back to our world.... pls

title: MINECRAFT IS THE BEST!!!!
review: Minecraft is the best game ever! It has so much do to. Fight off mobs with weapons, or build a horn your own creative way. Make farms for food, enchant your weapons, and explore villages. There is so much more to do! I‚Äôve played this since I was 4 years old and I still do! It‚Äôs AWESOME! If people hate on Minecraft, then I‚Äôm very disappointed in them. Minecraft is a one of a kind game with so much potential that it has already given us. More cool ideas can always be added. It has an awesome community, lots of servers and cool mods, and even has cool stuff like Minecon for you to look forward to. Because of COVID19, this year‚Äôs Minecon might be cancelled. I really hope not. Anyways, that is off topic to this review. I have so many good experiences playing Minecraft. I can remember worlds that me and my cousins would play in. We would build hotels and make our own parkour courses. We tested out with redefine and command blocks, too. Seriously, games like Fortnite have NOTHING against Minecraft! I‚Äôm always gonna be a Minecraft fan. I can‚Äôt wait for the new nether update coming! It‚Äôs advanced the nether A LOT! It‚Äôs just awesome! Plus, Minecraft puts out 2 big awesome updates a year. Seriously, I HIGHLY recommend Minecraft. Not scary, not boring, it‚Äôs VERY fun, even if your not a gamer, there is a 99.9% chance you are going to love it! The best game ever!!! :)
sentence: I can remember worlds that me and my cousins would play in.

title: i love this game but....
review: i LOVE this game but i am REALLY annoyed. i had 38,000 coins, 31 keys, 40 tokens from the latest update, and 4 characters that took me a while to get. i lost everything...here‚Äôs how it happened. today, i was looking at the coins thinking about buying some, and i tapped on the one that said 45,000. i didn‚Äôt see the price so i tapped on it to see how much it would be. it was loading and it took a while so i closed the app, that‚Äôs where it goes downhill...i had opened the app again and it took me to the screen where you learn how to play the game. i completely shut down my phone and turned on again, and it still was in that screen.  i‚Äôm low on storage so i don‚Äôt know if that‚Äôs why it restarted. i‚Äôm wondering if it‚Äôs possible for you guys to help me get everything back. my characters were tricky, tagbot and the the second skin for tagbot (i forgot the name of the outfit), lucy, and i think that‚Äôs it. please respond and let me know the reason why it restarted üò™
sentence: i completely shut down my phone and turned on again, and it still was in that screen.

title: Awful Update
review: All of my worlds have been corrupted since the latest update went live. My game crashes every few minutes, and upon loading the world again it deletes things. There was no need to change the villages' appearances, as they were what made Minecraft, well.. Minecraft. The game doesn't feel the same after the update, and to any new players, I would no longer recommend it. I've played this game for 7 years now, and I've never been this disappointed. A friend of mine can no longer even load the game to play our world together. It's upsetting. It's truly upsetting. The game lags and my world's so corrupted entire chunks glitch out. I don't like it anymore. And no company should ever send out an update that they know has problems they have to acknowledge in the update notice. That's just uncalled for. I'm really upset with the direction the game's going and a lot of people are claiming to be having these problems. I don't want my world to be messed up forever. I don't want to lose this game, but I can not only bear to stand to play it, I literally can't keep it open with this update. Get it together. I miss Minecraft being Minecraft and this update's ruined everything. I don't want anyone else to be as disappointed as I am. With the amount of kids that play this game, they don't deserve it. Their parents don't need to be stressing over why everything's wrong with their kid's game. Nobody wants this.
sentence: With the amount of kids that play this game, they don't deserve it.

title: A creative masterpiece
review: I don‚Äôt have long to write a review, but this game is amazing. I started playing from around age 6 and have enjoyed playing this game for 6 years. Even though I feel I‚Äôve only gotten decent recently I think this game is really fun. Not matter your trying to survive the night with your friends in survival, or building the mansion of your dreams in creative, best game ive ever played and has sculpted me as a gamer and in real life from the way I think of architecture and design. I can still remember being scared out my socks when I was only a kindle fire and it was day in the desert, and I went into a cave, then it was pitch black, I started to spin, and then I was lost. No escape. I was in survival for the first time which made it worse. Then Im spinning trying to see a light going deeper and deeper and BOOM! Got blown up by a creeper, let‚Äôs say I stuck to creative for a bit lol üòÇ. I love going on the MC discord and looking at all the amazing feedback I get from other players now that I have some actual good idea of what I‚Äôm doing and I‚Äôm trying to figure out redstone. One thing I would suggest, stop advertising the game as a game for little kids because even though I‚Äôm a kid I know when I‚Äôm an adult if you keep updating I‚Äôll still be playing! But great job mojang otherwise! Woah this was a lot longer than I anticipated. Keep up the great work!-Conor
sentence: Keep up the great work!

title: A few Suggestions
review: Subway Surfers is such a fun game! There are a few suggestions that I would like to make though. The first suggestion is decreasing the prices for the avatars. I just think they‚Äôre a little bit expensive. Don‚Äôt get me wrong they‚Äôre great characters, but bumping down the price a little wouldn‚Äôt hurt. The second suggestion is offering more discounts on things like coins and prize boxes in the game. Maybe you could even call it Discount Day or Discount Week. The last suggestion is putting more missions in the game. Like for example, having the game players find LIMITED EDITION Gold boxes along the trail, that are filled with SUPER RARE things like unlocking special characters or getting a BIG amount of gems or coins. Other than these few suggestions, this game is amazingly fun! I like how it travels around the world to a new location every other month, and has characters that you buy from that specific location to go along with the theme! This game is SUPER fun when you need a blast of adventure and thrill! My rating for this game would be the FULL 5 stars! You Subway Surfer Developers have earned it! Thanks again!‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏èü§©
sentence: You Subway Surfer Developers have earned it!

title: Really Good So Far!
review: I really love this game, it‚Äôs really fun! The graphics, gameplay, and everything overall is amazing! I was also thinking of some things that could be added. This is something I heard on the internet and isn‚Äôt original, but I wanted to spread it around because it sounds interesting. What if there was a role called ‚ÄúJester‚Äù where their goal is to get ejected, making them win? Sounds like it could be a hit or miss, but I think that‚Äôd be cool. Also a role of ‚ÄúDetective‚Äù sounds interesting. Like, you can give that person the option to take screenshots, so they can have solid alibis/evidence of the imposter, but only they have it, so that the crew mates don‚Äôt have too much of an advantage. They can send the screenshots to the chat, helping out their case (maybe also a limited amount of screenshots so their not overpowered?). Also the idea of adding friends would be cool! It‚Äôs sad you can‚Äôt add anyone, and the strangers you could enjoy playing with you‚Äôll only play with once. It would also be nice to adopt mini crew mates whenever their parent dies, I just think that would be very wholesome. More colors would also be cool, I mean, this is only optional since the colors that are already there are great, but I think it‚Äôs something to keep in mind. But overall, fantastic game! Can‚Äôt wait to see what else will come to it in the future!
sentence: This is something I heard on the internet and isn‚Äôt original, but I wanted to spread it around because it sounds interesting.

title: It was fun until...
review: I found this game through pewdiepie and was super excited to find that it was on mobile so I could try it for myself. The first few weeks were great until....it became popular. The community with in the game itself is very racist, homophobic, and just toxic in general. Also because of how popular it has become their are more hackers. I feel that their should be forbidden words that will prevent you from joining games for one hour if you use them more than 5 times. I try to spread positivity in the chat reassuring people that it‚Äôs just a game no need to get mad. But... when I do I just get called racial slurs, homophobic slurs, and horrible names in general. When joining a game on WiFi it will keep saying unable to connect. And it is too hard to kick people from games especially when everyone has to vote for them to leave. Teaming is a HUGE issue in the game with entire groups of friends outing the imposters as soon as the game starts. The emergency button is used too often... or often use it to SAY HI!!! I find it frustrating when trying to play the game. PLEASE ADD A VOICE CHAT OPTION!!! This would make the game so much easier and I feel that it would defer toxic language because you can hear a person‚Äôs voice. Also, many bugs ranging from, game connection error to animation glitches. PLEASE FIX THIS!!!! P.S : Sorry for the long paragraph I just love this game but hate the negativity surrounding the gameplay!
sentence: And it is too hard to kick people from games especially when everyone has to vote for them to leave.

title: This is difficult...
review: First of all I would like to say I like this game , it‚Äôs fun and entertaining. But the thing that is bothering me is that it‚Äôs so expensive to get characters! Like there is a time limit to get the characters and before I get a chance to buy it the time is done because of how long it takes to get enough coins. Um not saying they need to be SUPER CHEAP but at least cheaper than you make them ( I would recommend like 10-30k MAX) it‚Äôs ridiculous to spend 90k on a character! Also, it take a really long amount of time to get KEYS !!! Like there should be way more ways to get keys. I have been playing this game for over 3 months and got like 80 keys max. I feel that I should of had between like 1,000 at least. Overall it is a entertaining and fun game. I would recommend but just be aware for anyone who plays it it‚Äôs hard to get the things you want. I don‚Äôt like complaining but I just wanted to let you know.
sentence: I have been playing this game for over 3 months and got like 80 keys max.

title: Good game but has small issues.
review: I like this game. It is just like the old monopoly I used to play except way faster because the money was automatically transferred. I do have some complaints though. If you‚Äôre gonna make an app cost money, don‚Äôt have in-app purchases that cost more than the game itself. There is some small details that I am slightly concerned about. If you spam click a property you want to mortgage then you lose money until you can‚Äôt click it anymore. When you are paying someone money it will do the transfer animation with the monopoly dollars but it will do the same animation no matter how much money was given/lost. The dice. I am slightly annoyed when they land on a flat surface when it should be landing on top of the buildings. It would be cool if the dice Didn't land on the buildings as if they were drawn onto the board. If they landed on top of the buildings that would be cool. These are just minor issues that I would be fine if they didn‚Äôt change. Over all, this was a great game to play with my family and I highly recommend playing it because you can pay 15 dollars for the real version or 4 bucks for a virtual version that goes faster.
sentence: If they landed on top of the buildings that would be cool.

title: I love it but...
review: First of all, I don‚Äôt usually leave a comment or any reviews but this one push my hand considering this is one of my favorite games. First, i wanna say that the game‚Äôs interface is very well designed. It‚Äôs like playing the actual game on another level. Second, i like how we have the option to play the QUICK mode since this game is naturally takes forever (which is nice somehow) to end. Third and on the bad side, i wish there is a way for an actual chat rather than the pre wording that is not even applicable for every scenario. EG, if trading cards, reasoning for trades or refuse etc. that would be like the actual game and that will add the excitement in playing. Also, themes, boards, and tokens are way expensive. Would be nice since the game itself is paid, features should be lesser the price and not higher than the actual game. Lastly, on that note i wish there is an option to add the player as a friend for future game. That will actually make the experience more real rather than it‚Äôs always random guest and while playing with random people, you can‚Äôt add any of those players per say. Overall nice game. Worth the money. But these improvements will make it more fun to play the game.
sentence: Would be nice since the game itself is paid, features should be lesser the price and not higher than the actual game.

title: Fantastic family game!
review: Whenever we go out to eat we play this while waiting for our food. It‚Äôs always a fun time and sometimes even the waiter/waitress play along.Super fun! Super family friendly!
sentence: It‚Äôs always a fun time and sometimes even the waiter/waitress play along.

title: Awful Update
review: All of my worlds have been corrupted since the latest update went live. My game crashes every few minutes, and upon loading the world again it deletes things. There was no need to change the villages' appearances, as they were what made Minecraft, well.. Minecraft. The game doesn't feel the same after the update, and to any new players, I would no longer recommend it. I've played this game for 7 years now, and I've never been this disappointed. A friend of mine can no longer even load the game to play our world together. It's upsetting. It's truly upsetting. The game lags and my world's so corrupted entire chunks glitch out. I don't like it anymore. And no company should ever send out an update that they know has problems they have to acknowledge in the update notice. That's just uncalled for. I'm really upset with the direction the game's going and a lot of people are claiming to be having these problems. I don't want my world to be messed up forever. I don't want to lose this game, but I can not only bear to stand to play it, I literally can't keep it open with this update. Get it together. I miss Minecraft being Minecraft and this update's ruined everything. I don't want anyone else to be as disappointed as I am. With the amount of kids that play this game, they don't deserve it. Their parents don't need to be stressing over why everything's wrong with their kid's game. Nobody wants this.
sentence: A friend of mine can no longer even load the game to play our world together.

title: Greedy Developers
review: The developers of these kinds of games don‚Äôt care about giving us quality games, they just want to say they are making the games ‚Äúchallenging and fun‚Äù but are really just wanting us to dole out tons of real money to line their greedy pockets... Challenging and fun does not mean rob me blind just to get through some levels on a stupid game that looked awesome but was deceiving... I am having to use all my energy 3-5 times refilled just to get through one level!!! That is 15-25 energy for ONE FREAKING LEVEL!!! Some of these levels are near impossible and the developers don‚Äôt care to listen to our complaints since there are so many of us who give in to buying our way through the game we cannot otherwise get through... I have already uninstalled this pathetic excuse for a game... If I could develope a game similar to this and Matchington Manor/Gardenscapes, even poor as I am I know I wouldn‚Äôt be trying to rip people off... These games could be good and I would be willing to pay for packages but not just to get through levels... The ratio of money we earn in comparison to what things cost is just ridiculous... But like I said the developers of these games do not care about anything but lining heir filthy greedy pockets and I for one will not aid in doing so when I can play actual gun games that don‚Äôt require real money just to progress... Buying packages should be when you want to buy limited time house items or something...
sentence: I have already uninstalled this pathetic excuse for a game...

title: The developers literally ignored a crucial part of Minecraft
review: After signing in to my Xbox live account, I soon needed to go to a place without WiFi. However, I still wanted to play Minecraft single player. Without WiFi I tried to access Minecraft. Nope. All it said was ‚ÄúSigning in to Xbox live..‚Äù then it crashed. I literally tried everything. Clearing account data, restarting my device, nothing worked. My Minecraft just kept crashing.I can‚Äôt believe the developers managed to overlook a thing that is literally CRUCIAL to Minecraft, it‚Äôs single player ability. IT‚ÄôS LITERALLY CALLED MINECRAFT POCKET EDITION because with pocket edition, people can play Minecraft anywhere. YOU CAN PUT IT IN YOUR POCKET. How hard is it to make sure that Xbox live isn‚Äôt glitchy, doesn‚Äôt CRASH every time you open the app without wifi. Yet with this disgustingly glitchy Xbox live sign in and sign out if you‚Äôre still signed in you can‚Äôt even play without WiFi. How awful. Plus the world I was trying to get into didn‚Äôt even have Xbox achievements. So fantastic job, just fantastic. Now I have to sign in, sign out every time I get WiFi. Because any time I forget to sign out I will be trapped in a cycle of glitchy, crashing bugs every time I enter Minecraft.Awful. Terrible. I would give zero stars if I could unless they fix this ESSENTIAL feature of the game.
sentence: I can‚Äôt believe the developers managed to overlook a thing that is literally CRUCIAL to Minecraft, it‚Äôs single player ability.

title: Honestly this is just madness.
review: Now don't get me wrong. I really like minecraft. But don't just go like "oooh this guy is wrong he don't know what he is talking about" Well the people who say that could be right but I am a experienced player. I have seen the updates and changes. I have played since when even if you were in creative mode, hostile mobs such as creepers would put forth the best effort to kill you. Or they still follow you and explode in creative mode in the MCPE I enjoyed. Keyword: enjoyed. This is supposed to be portable? Hence "Pocket Edition" but now if I play it without wi-if it crashes. I played when hunger bars didn't exist. When it would be that if you move in water you swim up, when mobs could attack you from underwater or well let's say I was really deep into the ocean. The zombie just attacks me if I am under it. When you couldn't well screw it I just played for a long time let's say that. A suggestion? The launcher like choosing a mcpe version you like.  Just like java. Also please add the option to remove features and mobs without turning cheats on. Let's say I removed drowned. Cheats don't turn off. If I remove all hostile mobs. Never. Mind just bring old mcpe back with the launcher to change versions also fix the bug without wifi it crashes.

title: Initially Fun, But Frustrating
review: I downloaded Homescapes because of the ads for it I saw on Words With Friends. The ads mostly show the lead character, Austin the Butler, in a sticky situation and the player has to pull levers to get him out of it. The actual game, however, is mostly improving the large house owned by Austin‚Äôs parents.  The sticky situations are called ‚ÄúAustin‚Äôs Bad Dream and in 35 levels, I have only been able to see a few of them.  The game is mostly playing a form of Candy Crush to earn stars in order to improve the home. That part is not so bad. The music is pleasant and the game is a relaxing time waster, at least initially. I don‚Äôt mind using the earned stars to replace furniture or a rug, but as the game goes on, you have to use the stars to do just about anything like answering the door, unpacking a TV, or even starting a new day. And once you‚Äôre out of stars, you can‚Äôt do anything else until you have won more candy crush games and earned more stars. You earn one star from winning each candy crush game no matter how difficult the game is. Win in one round, earn one star. Win after 20 rounds, earn one star. The idea of course is to get the player to purchase items to play longer. I get it. Most games I have seen do the same thing, but they don‚Äôt ramp up the difficulty so quickly.
sentence: Most games I have seen do the same thing, but they don‚Äôt ramp up the difficulty so quickly.

title: Fun with a few minor issues
review: Don‚Äôt get me wrong, I love this game, but it seems a little slow. Like in the beginning when I was trying to repair the entry hall, the can of paint spilled. I know that it only took 1 star to clean it up, but really? That part was a waste of coding and time for one little thing that they don‚Äôt need, and it was annoying. I just started playing, and I already like it, but I also see that it will be a little stubborn and slow at certain times. And in Austin‚Äôs room, when your done with it and everything looks new, there‚Äôs a dusty old desk that doesn‚Äôt go with the room, and I felt  like I should replace it, but I can‚Äôt. There were a few more parts that didn‚Äôt need to be there, but they put them there. Like when Austin‚Äôs dad stomps on the floor and breaks it, he they didn‚Äôt have to do that. Austin would have repaired it anyway. I am also confused about when Austin got to the house and went into his room and instead of a bed, there was a couch. Where did he sleep? Also, if nobody had lived in the house for years, why where the clothes on the statues not dusty? If you make another game from another game then shouldn‚Äôt you mention it? I mean it said nothing about Gardenscapes. I liked the game, but it had a few issues.
sentence: Where did he sleep?

title: SO MUCH FUN.....when it works.
review: I love monopoly and the app because it takes away the hassle of keeping up with board pieces and having someone act as the bank. However, it is far too common for a player to get disconnected or for the game to freeze, ultimately ruining the entire game and leading me to have wasted 2 hours of my time. Also, it is hard to differentiate when a player is simply not paying attention, forgets to roll, or forgets to end their turn so it would be EXTREMELY USEFUL to have a ******chat function****** or at least a button the players could use to notify other players when the game has come to a standstill. I really hope that the monopoly app creators will take these suggestions into account as I have recommended the app to many people and know they have experienced the same frustration as me. Also, it would be awesome if their was a way to pause the game (which I know may actually difficult due to connection issues). Additionally, the game disconnects when someone gets a phone call or even if low battery signal pops up on a players phone. Sometimes the bots will pick up and play for the disconnected user but other times the game is screwed. Regardless, I love how the game is customizable and has great layouts. Love this game, will definitely keep playing, but would profoundly appreciate some improvements given that the Monopoly brand has historically been held with such high regard.
sentence: Additionally, the game disconnects when someone gets a phone call or even if low battery signal pops up on a players phone.

title: Love this game BUT changes need to be made!
review: I love this game! I‚Äôve played many games, but this one has become my favorite. Over time though, I am beginning to get frustrated! You only get about 50-80 coins a game after completing the level, but in order to get more chances to play it‚Äôs 900 coins for the first 5 extra moves and then goes up to 1200. I don‚Äôt even know what‚Äôs after that, because it‚Äôs just so much! Even with the rewards they grant, you only get 100 coins which is like nothing. You really have to spend money to play this game. I‚Äôve tried to be patient and play the games out without spending money, but many levels you just can‚Äôt! I don‚Äôt mind spending the money here and there, but it‚Äôs so expensive, it doesn‚Äôt even make it worth it. You get 1000 coins for .99 and it takes 900 coins to get 5 extra turns. That adds up really quick! Plus it‚Äôs even more expensive if you want power ups! I‚Äôm not too sure how much more I can continue playing if they don‚Äôt make some changes. It‚Äôs beginning to add up with how many coins I‚Äôve been buying just to beat rounds. On top of that I believe that there are also sometimes when the board isn‚Äôt applying the power ups correctly. It's almost like a glitch or something that‚Äôs not working. I‚Äôm really hoping they make some changes to this game! Such a shame that it seems they are more concerned about money, than people continuing to play.
sentence: You get 1000 coins for .99 and it takes 900 coins to get 5 extra turns.

title: Problems need fixing.
review: I don‚Äôt doubt that this is actually a good game because it looks like a really really fun concept. I just wish I was actually able to play it. So now I‚Äôm not even able to play with my friends, instead I have to go into a public game which ended up getting me kicked within the first few seconds because apparently people like to make their own games just to make it public then start kicking people which I seriously don‚Äôt understand. I‚Äôm not having a good first impression. I don‚Äôt doubt that a lot of people would like to respond to this comment by saying you just have to play for a bit longer but my point is I shouldn‚Äôt have to play for longer to try to finally experience the game and have fun with it, I shouldn‚Äôt have to constantly search for public games until eventually i come across someone who‚Äôs actually going to be nice, or actually be able to join a public game because for some reason this game decides to list games that are hosted by players but the game is already going so I‚Äôm not allowed to join. So seriously why list the match if I can‚Äôt join? I‚Äôm really hoping eventually I will be able to play the game and actually have fun with it but until then it‚Äôll continue to frustrate me, it seriously needs a lot of improvements until this can actually be something that I can enjoy.Please fix these issues because I‚Äôd love to try it.

title: My review to the creators
review: I‚Äôve had this app for quite a while now and it‚Äôs always been my 1# game to play when I‚Äôm offline and makes an entertaining game to play online to. The game is fun and requires lots of skill or just fast fingers. My only problems are the prices of some of the items. For the characters I think they can get a little bit pricey. When you get a mystery box it can give you items that help you unlock characters. I honestly think that it might take a month or almost a year to reach the amount because I‚Äôm not joking, they are really pricey. Unless you playing it nonstop without taking your eyes off the screen then it might take a few weeks. But that‚Äôs still a while. Also the hover boards. They can also get a little pricey. And why buy something that you can only use in certain times. It makes it worse that they can get really expensive. Honestly I think their pretty cool but please lower the prices. The last thing you might need to fix is the add lag. Sometimes it will start freezing up and you have to restart the app and that‚Äôs a little annoying in my opinion. I also think that you should only have to face adds if your getting something for free. Other than those issues I truly love the game! Sorry I couldn‚Äôt give it a 5, but I will if you fix the issues ü•∫. Keep making great games!
sentence: Sorry I couldn‚Äôt give it a 5, but I will if you fix the issues ü•∫.

title: Freezes!
review: I love this game, but recently in this last game, I was playing custom rules, four players, two hard, one easy one me. Two were bankrupt and I got all of their property and fully populated them with houses and hotels. But every time this other player, who has three hotels, lands in a place where they have to pay me a thousand dollars or so,they collect all their money through mortgages and selling their hotels, but then the setting button disappears and they don‚Äôt give me the money. The bored is still moving, but I‚Äôm not getting paid. I‚Äôve tried closing the game and it either lets them redo their move so I don‚Äôt get payed, or they stay there and keep going but I still don‚Äôt get payed. It wouldn‚Äôt have bankrupted them, but it would give me over 3000 dollars? Maybe that‚Äôs why? I don‚Äôt know. But it‚Äôs very annoying. Especially since I play this game to calm down!
sentence: I don‚Äôt know.

title: READ THIS REVIEW!!!!
review: Ok. This game is super fun! I love how you get to visit new locations (BTW I‚Äôve been to Amsterdam so it was fun to see it in the game.), get cool characters, and enjoy running in the subway.I personally think that the graphics are great. They don‚Äôt have to be perfect, as you can still play the game without problems. I have tried programming before and it IS NOT EASY. I would like to give a shoutout to whoever made this game because it is fabulous, no matter what others say.I do think that the characters are a little over priced, but that is just me. I do like how there are lots of ways to earn the money for them. (Play the game itself, watch adds, get mystery boxes, ETC.)Maybe you could add a feature where you could sign in with another account. I get that you don‚Äôt need an account to play (And that is great!) but my favorite character, Tagbot, is on my other device. I remember him being very expensive and I would love a way to sign into that account on another device so I could get Tagbot back.Thank you for reading this review. I can tell that this game was planned out and worked hard on. Great job!!!
sentence: They don‚Äôt have to be perfect, as you can still play the game without problems.

title: Classic
review: I have been playing this game since I was 10 years old. All the rules are correct. Thank you for not trying to fix or improve something that isn‚Äôt broken! However I do have one concern. During the game I had an opponent land on a chance and received the ‚ÄúAdvance token to Boardwalk‚Äù card. Another person rolled and also landed on chance. Then I landed on chance and received the same card as the first guy ‚ÄúAdvance token to Boardwalk‚Äù. Now when I was a young boy I was told you‚Äôre supposed to put your card in another pile and shuffle them when they are all used up. Or you can keep them in rotation and place the card at the bottom. You guys need to fix this. Also I recommend creating more free tokens the options are extremely minimal. Other than that the game is excellent, no glitches, no freezing up. They also have online multiplayer! Thank you!
sentence: I have been playing this game since I was 10 years old.

title: Playability issues :(
review: This is a pretty cool imagining of Monopoly, but there are a few things really holding the game back.First, it‚Äôs freemium. This is obviously built on that annoying subscription model for premium services. And it‚Äôs not free in the first place. No, I don‚Äôt want to pay extra for a new board or player piece...it‚Äôs just software. Give me a break.Second, there are some pretty bad playability issues. One is initiating trades; the user interface makes it impossible to pick multiple things on the left half of the screen because the player boxes cover the properties. Another is that tapping anywhere near the bottom right when trying to select one of your own properties causes the game to think you tapped the ‚Äúend turn‚Äù button, screwing up your turn. Another horrible gameplay thing is the fact that AI players constantly choose ‚Äúauction‚Äù instead of buying properties outright, which is not at all like how people in real life play the game. Not only that, but the AI player that initiated the auction will bid all the way up to the original cost of the property...why on earth would anyone ever do that? Sloppy gameplay for sure.The older Monopoly game on the App Store, which I purchased long ago, was quite a bit better. This is obviously aimed at milking people for buying new playing boards and player pieces. Pretty gross cash grab. And the playability stuff should never have made it past QA.
sentence: The older Monopoly game on the App Store, which I purchased long ago, was quite a bit better.

title: annoyed
review: i‚Äôm tired of getting kicked out of every game because y‚Äôall can not fix your game. it steady says kicked out due to disconnect from the server. idk how the game picks who the imposter is but it needs to change because not every one gets a chance to be imposter. the same person will be imposter 5 times in a row and it‚Äôs unfair and it‚Äôs not fun. i love the idea of the game but the way people talk on there to each other is ridiculous. my personal opinion there needs to be a sensor or whatever on the game to who ever is bullying or saying rude unnecessary comments needs to be ban from the game COMPLETELY . it may be anonymous and it might just be a game , but it‚Äôs still bullying and some of the things people say on there is just plain out cruel. the game is addictive don‚Äôt get me wrong but all these bugs got to be fixed and this game has been out for a good 2 months ? and there are still a bunch of glitches. it makes me not wanna play anymore because every time i start a game or through out a game it kicks me out. and i don‚Äôt think people should be able to leave the room once the game starts. they leave because they aren‚Äôt imposter and it‚Äôs annoying when you start with 10 players and end up with 4 because you don‚Äôt evenly distribute out the imposter. you‚Äôve added stuff to the game but yet have fixed the bugs. it makes no sense at all.

title: This game rocks my world, BUT:
review: This game is pretty fun, but there are a couple of complaints I have to let out: 1: I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs fair that you have to spend 900 coins if you want just 5 moves. Then, if you want another 5, you have to spend 1200!!!!! That is messed up. 2: the parents don‚Äôt give you enough credit. You work really hard to get just one star (which I will complain about later) and you choose what you like, but the parents (mostly the dad) are just ‚Äúeh, it‚Äôs nice, but we‚Äôre are still gonna sell the house.‚Äù It‚Äôs like you can‚Äôt do anything that‚Äôs good enough for them! 3: I do not like the fact that you only get 1 star per game. 1 star!!! We could be making MILLIONS of stars if the game let us get one star every time we make a power-up! It‚Äôs just not fair. Now, I love the game, but the thing is that sometimes you‚Äôre not there when the game gives you free lives for only 30 minutes. I‚Äôm not always there, which in other words, it‚Äôs a waste of lives. I myself and maybe other people agree that you should change the game to something else. No offense, the game just needs a bit of a tweak.
sentence: 3: I do not like the fact that you only get 1 star per game.

title: CRASHES: SUPPORT WILL NOT RESPOND
review: I've read this from other reviewers as well. After purchasing multiple packs the app will now no longer launch. Instead, it crashes immediately. I've reached out several times to support about the issue but they refuse to respond to my support ticket. It's too bad because I loved playing this game with my children. There is no other explanation other than pure corporate theft. If they're not careful this could end up becoming a class-action lawsuit based on the number of complaint and the lack of support.
sentence: I've reached out several times to support about the issue but they refuse to respond to my support ticket.

title: Minecraft
review: Many can agree that this is the app we grew up on. This app is amazing, along with its beautiful, tear-bringing soundtrack. As I look back on the app, it has changed so much. It sounds crazy, but I almost wish it was back to the days when you lived off of cows and used boats, but now it‚Äôs all cheats and crazy builds and bees. But my favorite part has to be the soundtrack. Listening to these songs, all the memories flow in and rush back, and I think about my brother and cousin building a mansion, and me begging to play, or when my brother would still play with me. This game was my childhood. And while everyone else is crooning over Fortnite, Minecraft remains the best. The music is just magnificent. But, there are a few things that need fixing. Whenever I get on, it says there was an account error, and I don‚Äôt even have an account. Also, I made a few characters and they fail to load. Finally, I just wish on Pocket Edition you could go back to different updates so I could play like I used to; no bees, no dolphins, no crazy stuff - just how the game started out. For me, listening to the soundtrack and the scent of Winter Candy Apple by Bath and Body Works brings back all the memories. Minecraft will always be with us. I know this is long, but this game is so worth it. Great job, Mojang, and Notch, and all the others. You have created history.
sentence: Also, I made a few characters and they fail to load.

title: Amazing but a few things...
review: Ok, I have been playing Minecraft for years. Each update is better then the last, adding amazing animals and new objects. However I have noticed in the recent update, TONS of new bugs and issues have occurred. Such as, sometimes when I am crafting something, I craft it and then go back in the crafting table. But my item is still there. I try to remove it, but it just replaces itself with another one. I end having to close the app and reopen it. Another problem that has recently developed is, whenever I go into chat when I am on a sever, my game immediately freezes, then crashes and knocks me out of the app. Another thing that has recently happened is when I am playing and go into my inventory, it freezes and won‚Äôt unfreeze. One more is, sometimes when I go into the nether, it stays frozen on the ‚Äúloading terrain‚Äù screen. Other than these glitches and bugs, I HIGHLY recommend this game. Whenever I want to play a fun game, this will always be my first choice. With the endless building ideas, the challenge of defeating the bosses, and playing countless games and tests Minecraft is the best game out there and will make you play for hours. A few animal ideas are:Bears, birds, snakes, frogs, mice, sharks, squirrel, elephant, lion, monkey, butterfly, crab, deer, penguin, kangaroo, koala, raccoon, alligator or crocodile and more types of dogs.Thank you for reading!
sentence: Each update is better then the last, adding amazing animals and new objects.

title: I love this game and it‚Äôs great for the entire family.
review: We have such a great time playing. There is a deck for everyone including each of our favorite shows. We play at dinner, we play at Disneyland while in line, we play for family game night. It‚Äôs so much fun and we always look for new decks. And for just adults it‚Äôs fun to see us all try to guess, just add alcohol and the silliness quadruples. Get this app, you won‚Äôt regret it.
sentence: Get this app, you won‚Äôt regret it.

title: It was fun... until the update

Before the update I couldn‚Äôt wait for the new map to come out. It wouldn‚Äôt come out so I deleted the app and reinstalled it. The reinstalled version had the update. First of all, it asks you to type in your birthday. And if you‚Äôre under 13 or whatever age it is, it won‚Äôt even let you chose your own name! What‚Äôs up with that? However it did have the new map. But with the new update I can only use the quick chat thingy which stinks. Anyway, I tried joining a game and when the game was about to tell if I‚Äôm crewmate or imposter or whatever the screen goes black and nothing happens. So I close out of the app and delete the app. When I re-downloaded it it didn‚Äôt let me chose my age again, so I was stuck with the non-custom name and the quick chat. Anyway I joined a game and my screen turned black when the game started again! So I deleted the app, reset my phone, and reinstalled it and the same things happened again! So, now I guess I can‚Äôt play among us anymore. It used to be so fun, but now I can‚Äôt even play it. üò° so, I gave it more than 1 star because it‚Äôs fun, but no more than 3 stars because I can‚Äôt play it anymore.

title: Used to be fun
review: I‚Äôve been playing this game for a while and am at level 1700+ Full disclosure, I‚Äôve never spent any real money on this game. Not that they‚Äôre not working extra hard to make you do it... When I started playing, it was fun because I always had a chance to win. The kite will do what it‚Äôs supposed to and the bombs won‚Äôt go and destroy the next move. The rocket with a kite won‚Äôt go and clear the row with already a rocket in it, thus ruining 2 rockets. Decorating wasn‚Äôt as hard either. You didn‚Äôt need a star to make every call and 2 stars for a rehearsal. Around level 900 it started getting frustrating and I stopped for a while. A few months ago I started playing and nothing is the same. The power ups are there to ruin your game. One has to depend on luck than tact to win. It‚Äôs now designed to eat all your hammers, kites, gloves etc but still won‚Äôt let you win. If I was frustrated before, I‚Äôm finding it hard to express myself now. Ofcourse the proportion of coins you win to the stars you earn was always unfair but atleast I knew that in every game there would be some move and a definite chance to win. They want you to buy coins, I get it, they are after all here for the money. But looks like they‚Äôre taking away the fun factor away from the game which for me has been the biggest disappointment. This was a good game, very addictive and fun. It‚Äôs getting hard to say that that is true anymore.
sentence: Decorating wasn‚Äôt as hard either.

title: Need to spend money
review: This game was fun for the first 10-15 levels, then I realized that almost every level beyond that is impossible to beat without spending money. I spent a little thinking it was just a hard level I needed to get by, but then every level after that has been just as hard. I play a lot of these match 3 games, and have done VERY well in them without having to spend a ton of money, it's just not fair to give a player 25 moves to accomplish 3 different things in one level! I want to keep playing because I like the concept and I like decorating the house, but I cannot keep spending money to beat levels, I've barely now made it to the kitchen and have probably spent $60 on this stupid game. And I see many many others have complained of the same thing. Wish I read reviews before I installed and got hooked. Game makers need to change the amount of moves you have on the levels or give more rewards for beating levels and get more lives quicker. I'll probably end up deleting if it doesn't change. Too bad because it was fun while it lasted!
sentence: Wish I read reviews before I installed and got hooked.

title: I love it but...
review: First of all, I don‚Äôt usually leave a comment or any reviews but this one push my hand considering this is one of my favorite games. First, i wanna say that the game‚Äôs interface is very well designed. It‚Äôs like playing the actual game on another level. Second, i like how we have the option to play the QUICK mode since this game is naturally takes forever (which is nice somehow) to end. Third and on the bad side, i wish there is a way for an actual chat rather than the pre wording that is not even applicable for every scenario. EG, if trading cards, reasoning for trades or refuse etc. that would be like the actual game and that will add the excitement in playing. Also, themes, boards, and tokens are way expensive. Would be nice since the game itself is paid, features should be lesser the price and not higher than the actual game. Lastly, on that note i wish there is an option to add the player as a friend for future game. That will actually make the experience more real rather than it‚Äôs always random guest and while playing with random people, you can‚Äôt add any of those players per say. Overall nice game. Worth the money. But these improvements will make it more fun to play the game.
sentence: Overall nice game.

title: Best game ever
review: I absolutely love this game! Although, I see a lot of negative feedback, I 100% disagree. To explain the complaints about how hard it is to beat people who are in gold/diamond, they have worked hard to get to where they are. So, yes it may be a little challenging to beat them but that‚Äôs not the games fault. I believe this game is one of the best games out there. Especially because the game is culture friendly. This game has characters from all over the world, and even characters that are make believe or just not real. I have been playing this game since i was little, my grandmother introduced me to the game and I got pretty addicted. But, in my opinion that just goes to show this game is for ALL ages and everyone can enjoy it. So again please don‚Äôt blame the game for those that have worked hard to permanently earn a spot in gold/diamond. If you made it to the end of my LONG review, thanks for reading my report. And for those who have never had the game, I really suggest this to anyone of any gender or age. Thank you developers of the game who made the game so perfect! ü§ó
sentence: I believe this game is one of the best games out there.

title: Subway Surfers Saved My Life
review: this app is truly my only reason to live, and honestly, i dont need a better one. every single aspect of this this game is absolutely perfect. this game is so good that im writing a review whilst my phone is on 5%. ive played many games including doom (2016), Gta V, The Legend of Zelda Ocarina of the wild, Criseses 3, Crisis Warhead, Crysis, Flappy Bird and Crossy Road. and this game tops them all in every possible variation. the gramphics are so realistic that when i got caught by the police and was brutalized by him and his dog, it felt real, breathtaking even. the story, although very intricate, has a clear plot that is understandable, yet intriguing. and greatest gameplay to grace videogaming ever. i mean wow. i would like to restate the fact that i played super mario 64 and this has much better controls and gameplay. this is the peak of our human existence. this is the only reason i wake up day after day. thank you so much halfbrick games and also a thank you to glu games. you‚Äôve really done it :) ( but this is actually a pretty good game no cap)
sentence: this is the peak of our human existence.

title: Good game BUT BUGS QUICK CHAT
review: First of all this is a great game but there is a few issues like people walking in walls but really aren't and you are on their screen. The next thing i'd like to report is that when the imposter leaves in a meeting it won't automatically make the crewmates win, it will wait until the end of the meeting to crash everyone's game. The next thing is sabotaging bugs. The latest game i played it the imposter sabotaged O2 but then when it got to zero the numbers went onto negatives all the way to -11. The next important bug is when you are quick chatting, you might vote someone without knowing. The second to last thing i would like to share is on a mobile device when you first load in it just has part of the o and ng in, probably trying to say among us but it only says ong. Finally, the game is great and all, but i think the quick chat feature kind of got the game to become less popular, because you can't say what you want to say, or people just spam their quick chat thing so even when you say no one will see it or even believe it! You can't even say hi or talk about the latest game! Heck you can't even say gg! Are we even going to talk about when you try to join the game it says "the game is full" when it only showed 2 people in it! Also a lot of the time when you quick chat the letters are not in the chat box you made it's just somewhere out of it! PLEASE FIX THESE BUGS SOON INNERSLOTH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
sentence: The next important bug is when you are quick chatting, you might vote someone without knowing.

title: One issue
review: This game was fun, mellow, challenging, and all around perfect the first day or two I started playing. Very addictive in the beginning, but I‚Äôve hit level 24 I believe, and no matter how many coins I spend, power ups I use, or times I play, I can‚Äôt get past it, and it‚Äôs very frustrating. I‚Äôve literally spent 7 days clicking on the app, attempting the level a few times, failing, and not being able to move on with the game. I‚Äôm so fed up, I‚Äôve had this app sitting here for a week and haven‚Äôt made any progress. I‚Äôve even had friends try to beat the level, and other people who have played games similar to this. When you first see the level you think ‚Äúoh, easy‚Äù but as you go on, you only have so few moves to collect 40 yellow and 40 blue and about 85% of the map is covered in boxes. You only have 20 moves to rid the map of enough boxes to get more yellow and blue on the screen and only what‚Äôs left to collect forty of each color! I know these games aren‚Äôt meant to be easy. I love a challenge, but this is ridiculous. I literally love the game so much I don‚Äôt want to delete it because I want to keep going and finissshhh!
sentence: I literally love the game so much I don‚Äôt want to delete it because I want to keep going and finissshhh!

title: Great!
review: This is a very popular game that has managed to find its way into nearly everyone‚Äôs device at some point. I‚Äôve taken it off and on over the last few years, and this time it‚Äôs definitely here to stay. I‚Äôve always been satisfied with this game and have loved the changes. This time (since I re-downloaded) I‚Äôve gotten a lot more into the game, collecting the characters and boards, and completing the challenges. It‚Äôs a lot of fun!There is one thing that I would love to see. When you get a power up like the coin magnet or the bouncy shoes a little flash of light shoots out! Then a little time bar pops up at the bottom showing how long you have said power up. Sometimes you will have multiple power ups and be too focused on the obstacles ahead to really be paying attention to the individual time bars. It would be nice if you could add another little white burst (or some effect) that pops up on the actual character to show the power up has gone away. Too many times have I tried to jump over a train only to realize too late my bounce shoes are gone!Thank you for your work!
sentence: Too many times have I tried to jump over a train only to realize too late my bounce shoes are gone!

title: Cute and fun! üëåüèª But here‚Äôs the thing.
review: Homescapes is a good app. Not amazing but it‚Äôs good. It‚Äôs cute, it‚Äôs colorful and you feel accomplished when you fix the tv or replace the chair. The characters are nice and honestly kind of funny. üòÑ and I‚Äôm glad you guys even included pets in the game! I like how everything is tried to kept decorated around the house. I like Homescapes much better than gradenscapes just because the colors and the graphics are better int my opinion. At least the game is a little better.     The problem is you have to get stars from playing one game only. And even on a hard level you still get 1 star. It‚Äôs annoying how fast your stars run out. What‚Äôs even more annoying, it‚Äôs that sometimes you have to give one of your stars just to open a box, that you‚Äôve already given a star for box to get to the house! What I‚Äôm saying is give more chances to get stars. Like as a prize. Instead of just money, give us a little money and a star! Or have different games besides just the one game to match the colors.     Another thing is that it takes so long to complete one floor or one area of the house because of how limited of the stars you have. So I suppose you should just focus on the star problem because it will fix this one of taking so long! üòÜ     Please take this into consideration. The game would be much more entertaining and exciting if I didn‚Äôt give up so much on the game. Thank you üêòüêòüêò
sentence: Homescapes is a good app.

title: The best game ever

title: Great but the update, not so great
review: I‚Äôve been playing this almost daily since 2012!  Great, mindless way to decompress after a long day. The update however.... I just downloaded the most recent update to the update and it seems to be a bit better. The controls are still a bit whacked out. It seems to have a hard time figuring out that you are trying to move left when in midair. Always seems to want to roll or jump instead. I do not notice the same when moving right. The pogo sticks need some reworking. I can rarely see which lane the prize is in at the end of the jump. Finally, some of the challenges have not been working. I had one with no rolls or jumps in a certain number of points that would not increment or ever reach success criteria no matter how long I went. Then suddenly would declare success out of the blue. Another one where I have to clear so many hurdles, and then another where I have to run through bushes, don‚Äôt seem to work if I currently have a power up. Would be nice to have these fixed!Keep up the great work. Thanks and cheers!
sentence: Keep up the great work.

title: A few new mobs I would like to be in Minecraft
review: Hi! I just thought of a few new mobs I would like for the developers to add into Minecraft! I hope they at least add in one of them. 1. Skele-Fish. It is a fish that can be found in all water sources in every biome, except for swamps. It can only spawn in when the world is in easy, normal, or hard. It can drop up to 3 bones when killed, it doesn‚Äôt attack you unless if you attack it first,  (just like when you hit a wolf in survival when it isn‚Äôt tamed to anyone in that world) it deals three hearts when it attacks you, and it has a body made of bones with no eyes. 2. Black Bear. A bear with a brown snout, brown belly, and all the rest is black fur. It can only be found in Taiga (spruce forest) biomes. It has the same body that the polar bear does. It eats raw fish of any type and sweet berries, but you cannot tame them, you can only breed them (just like the foxes). They can spawn when the world is in peaceful, easy, normal, or hard. But when it is peaceful, when you attack them they won‚Äôt attack you back. But when it isn‚Äôt in peaceful when you attack one, they deal 4 hearts when the player is in survival. 3. Penguin. It only spawns in snowy plains and on icebergs. They eat raw fish of any type, but you cannot tame them, you can only breed them. They have a white belly and the rest is all-black. They do not attack you when you hit them in easy, normal, or hard.
sentence: They can spawn when the world is in peaceful, easy, normal, or hard.

title: Playability issues :(
review: This is a pretty cool imagining of Monopoly, but there are a few things really holding the game back.First, it‚Äôs freemium. This is obviously built on that annoying subscription model for premium services. And it‚Äôs not free in the first place. No, I don‚Äôt want to pay extra for a new board or player piece...it‚Äôs just software. Give me a break.Second, there are some pretty bad playability issues. One is initiating trades; the user interface makes it impossible to pick multiple things on the left half of the screen because the player boxes cover the properties. Another is that tapping anywhere near the bottom right when trying to select one of your own properties causes the game to think you tapped the ‚Äúend turn‚Äù button, screwing up your turn. Another horrible gameplay thing is the fact that AI players constantly choose ‚Äúauction‚Äù instead of buying properties outright, which is not at all like how people in real life play the game. Not only that, but the AI player that initiated the auction will bid all the way up to the original cost of the property...why on earth would anyone ever do that? Sloppy gameplay for sure.The older Monopoly game on the App Store, which I purchased long ago, was quite a bit better. This is obviously aimed at milking people for buying new playing boards and player pieces. Pretty gross cash grab. And the playability stuff should never have made it past QA.
sentence: And the playability stuff should never have made it past QA.

title: Awesome game, a few suggestions
review: Words can‚Äôt describe how much I love this game!! It‚Äôs just so fun and addicting. I just got it about three weeks ago and I haven‚Äôt stopped playing since. Although it‚Äôs a very well made very fun to play game, there‚Äôs some things that I think would be cool to add either to among us or among us 2. 1. There should be a way to kick people faster if you‚Äôre the host during a game. Some people like to call emergency meetings and waste time, so being able to kick them out would make it go by way faster. 2. I think it would be awesome to add a send a friend request button. Some people have really good friendships on here and a lot of the time one of them might disconnect or have to go and never see each other again! ;( If we had a add friend button, we could always play with them. Plus, when you try to give your personal number or social media‚Äôs out to someone, the whole server can see it unless you ban them all. 3. I think I saw this on another review, but maybe add a limit to camera time? It‚Äôs kinda hard to kill when people are guarding the cameras. 4. Hackers and exploiters should be automatically banned from playing. Maybe you could install a thing that detects their programming and stuff? They ruin the game a lot. Other than that, this game is amazing! Definitely game of the year. It‚Äôs made 2020 so much better. 5 stars for sure

title: Oh god
review: OK listen I loved the game so much. Till they added quick chat. Quick chat just makes the game even more confusing it limits what you get to say. So you see the system of quick chat is pretty flawed, specially if there‚Äôs a new player in the game that doesn‚Äôt even know how to chat. When this update first came in I was excited until I found out all the things that I would have to learn it was more confusing than a second grader taking a 12th grade math test. Thank you and have a good day.

title: this HAS to be a joke.
review: i truly regret not reading the previous reviews before updating the app. this update was probably the worst downgrade ever. the graphics and the design look like a 7 year old dictated it. the only people that could seriously enjoy this game now are most likely under the age of 10 (not even that.) i seriously hope y‚Äôall decide to change it back to the original design after this month because this update was not it. literally everyone wants the classic version back. please read the reviews and learn from your mistakes because this update was a huge one. i get that you guys probably wanted something different considering that the app is 8 years old now, but changing the entire layout of the app wasn‚Äôt a good idea. it turned a wonderful game into a confusing mess. not only that, the game is 2x more laggy, the characters glitch while running, and the facebook friends aren‚Äôt showing up. this update is a train wreck. it just appears that this was clearly rushed and with that a whole bunch of errors along with it. to all the people reading this, if you haven‚Äôt updated it, DON‚ÄôT. you will genuinely regret it. i‚Äôm only rating it 3 stars because i‚Äôve played this game since 2014 and it obviously deserves the credit, but if i hadn‚Äôt then this app would be a guaranteed 1 star since the update. (if that wouldn‚Äôt have happened then it would be 5. i strongly recommend that you revert the game to its traditional setup and layout. thanks)
sentence: the only people that could seriously enjoy this game now are most likely under the age of 10 (not even that.)

title: Has some fatal flaws
review: As you play the game, things get harder pretty fast. For example, every task around the house goes from costing one star to two. The rewards aren‚Äôt sufficient to the amount of boosts being spent on harder levels. Some levels are so hard and waste so many lives that you have to use boosts just to get through it. There should be more levels that don‚Äôt take multiple tries to get through. Some of the tasks that the game makes you do are stupid. The game is trying to get you to use all your stars so you have to play more, which is typical, but with the levels so hard, it‚Äôs really just a tactic to get people to spend more money. It‚Äôs also takes way too long for the lives to reload. It‚Äôs like 25mins per life. I really liked this game at the start but the further I‚Äôve gotten, the less I want to continue playing. Instead of throwing in so many different aspects into the puzzle games so soon, they should have waited and made it harder much later. I‚Äôm only in the kitchen and I spend on average 3-5 lives on each level. I try not to use boosters because they are so hard to earn. Paying 900coins to get 5 more moves on one level, when each level earns you roughly 50-70 coins (hard levels earn you 100+) is just sad. In conclusion, this game only remains fun for the first 60 levels then gets frustrating. Pretty much a scheme to get consumers to spend a lot of money.
sentence: There should be more levels that don‚Äôt take multiple tries to get through.

title: 10 STARS!!!!!!!! DOWNLOAD NOW!!!!!!!!!!
review: This game is amazing! It is so easy to use, and the 4 dollars that I paid for it was so worth it! This beats any other Monopoly app that I have used BY FAR. It lets you get all the same Monopoly experiences as the board game, such as auctions, but the game is way faster! Also, there are absolutely NO ads! It lets you customize the game rules, too! For example, you can change the number of houses you need to have on a property before you can buy a hotel. My favorite thing about this game is the hassle-free games! Just tap a few buttons, and BOOM! You‚Äôre playing Monopoly! There‚Äôs no organizing money, or dealing with cards, It‚Äôs just SO EASY!!!! I mean, if I could, I would give this game 10 STARS!!!!!! Another great thing about this game is that it saves your games! For example, if you start a game but then you run out of time, you can exit the game and when you open it back up your game is still there. DOWNLOAD THIS GAME NOW!!!!!!!!!
